import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { studentService } from '../services/api'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; import { AcademicCapIcon, UserPlusIcon, BuildingLibraryIcon, BookOpenIcon, CheckCircleIcon, XCircleIcon, ClockIcon, UsersIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const StudentAdminDashboard = () => { const { data: statsData, isLoading, error } = useQuery( 'studentStats', studentService.getStudentStats, { retry: 1, refetchInterval: 30000 // Actualizar cada 30 segundos } ); if (isLoading) { return (
); } if (error) { return (

Error al cargar estadísticas

{error.response?.data?.error || 'Error de conexión'}

); } const { summary, charts, latestStudents } = statsData?.data || {}; const statsCards = [ { title: 'Total Estudiantes', value: summary?.totalStudents || 0, icon: AcademicCapIcon, color: 'bg-blue-500', textColor: 'text-blue-600', bgColor: 'bg-blue-50' }, { title: 'Estudiantes Activos', value: summary?.activeStudents || 0, icon: CheckCircleIcon, color: 'bg-green-500', textColor: 'text-green-600', bgColor: 'bg-green-50' }, { title: 'Total Cursos', value: summary?.totalCourses || 0, icon: BuildingLibraryIcon, color: 'bg-purple-500', textColor: 'text-purple-600', bgColor: 'bg-purple-50' }, { title: 'Nuevos (30 días)', value: summary?.recentStudents || 0, icon: ClockIcon, color: 'bg-yellow-500', textColor: 'text-yellow-600', bgColor: 'bg-yellow-50' } ]; return (
{/* Encabezado */}

Panel de Administración de Estudiantes

Gestiona estudiantes, cursos y materias del sistema educativo

Nuevo Estudiante Ver Estudiantes
{/* Tarjetas de estadísticas */}
{statsCards.map((stat, index) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (

{stat.title}

{stat.value}

); })}
{/* Distribución por nivel */}

Estudiantes por Nivel

{charts?.studentsByLevel && Object.entries(charts.studentsByLevel).map(([level, count]) => { const percentage = summary?.totalStudents > 0 ? ((count / summary.totalStudents) * 100).toFixed(1) : 0; return (
{level}
{count} ({percentage}%)
); })}
{/* Estudiantes recientes */}

Estudiantes Recientes

{latestStudents && latestStudents.length > 0 ? ( latestStudents.map((student) => (
{student.firstName?.charAt(0)?.toUpperCase()}

{student.firstName} {student.lastName}

{student.grade} - {student.section}

{student.isActive ? 'Activo' : 'Inactivo'}

{new Date(student.enrollmentDate).toLocaleDateString('es-ES')}

)) ) : (

No hay estudiantes recientes

)}
{latestStudents && latestStudents.length > 0 && (
Ver todos los estudiantes →
)}
{/* Estado del sistema académico */}

Estado del Sistema Académico

Estudiantes con Curso {summary?.studentsWithCourse || 0}
0 ? ((summary?.studentsWithCourse || 0) / summary.totalStudents * 100) : 0}%` }} >
Promedio Materias/Estudiante {charts?.averageSubjectsPerStudent || 0}
Mínimo requerido: 6 materias
Materias Disponibles {summary?.totalSubjects || 0}
{summary?.activeSubjects || 0} activas
{/* Acciones rápidas */}

Acciones Rápidas

Nuevo Estudiante

Registrar estudiante

Gestionar Cursos

Administrar cursos

Gestionar Materias

Administrar materias

Reportes

); }; export default StudentAdminDashboard;
